trans-unit.source: Represents a numeric value between - 10^38 +1 and 10^38 - 1, with fixed precision and scale.
trans-unit.target: 表示数值之间-10 ^38 + 1 和 10 ^38-1，具有固定的精度和小数位数。

trans-unit.source: SqlDecimal has different underlying data structures from its corresponding .NET Framework <xref:System.Decimal> data type.
trans-unit.target: SqlDecimal 已从其相应的.NET Framework 的不同基础数据结构<xref:System.Decimal>数据类型。</xref:System.Decimal>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Decimal> has no concept of precision.
It uses 3 bytes to store the actual data, and therefore has a maximum scale of 28.
trans-unit.target: 它使用 3 个字节来存储实际数据，并因此具有最大小数位数为 28。

trans-unit.source: SqlDecimal has both precision and scale.
trans-unit.target: SqlDecimal 具有精度和小数位数。

trans-unit.source: It uses 4 unsigned 4-byte integers to store the actual data, and therefore has maximum precision and scale of 38.
trans-unit.target: 它使用 4 4 字节无符号的整数来存储实际数据，并因此具有最大精度和小数位数为 38。

trans-unit.source: The data range is - 10^38 +1 through 10^38 - 1.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure using the supplied <xref:System.Decimal> value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构使用提供<xref:System.Decimal>值。</xref:System.Decimal>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Decimal> value to be stored as a <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure using the supplied double parameter.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构使用提供的双精度型参数。

trans-unit.source: A double, representing the value for the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 双精度，表示的值的新<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure using the supplied integer value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构使用提供的整数值。

trans-unit.source: The supplied integer value which will the used as the value of the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 提供的整数值，它将用作新值<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure using the supplied long integer value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构使用提供的长整型值。

trans-unit.source: The supplied long integer value which will the used as the value of the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 提供的长整型值，它将用作新值<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure using the supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构使用提供的参数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of digits that can be used to represent the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*> property of the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 用于表示的数字的最大数<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>属性的新<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The number of decimal places to which the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*> property will be resolved for the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 小数位数数<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>属性将解析为新<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure represents a positive or negative number.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，该值指示是否新<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构表示正数或负数。

trans-unit.source: The 128-bit unsigned integer that provides the value of the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供的新值的 128 位无符号的整数<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure using the supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构使用提供的参数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of digits that can be used to represent the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*> property of the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 用于表示的数字的最大数<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>属性的新<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The number of decimal places to which the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*> property will be resolved for the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 小数位数数<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>属性将解析为新<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure represents a positive or negative number.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，该值指示是否新<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构表示正数或负数。

trans-unit.source: An 32-bit unsigned integer which will be combined with data2, data3, and data4 to make up the 128-bit unsigned integer that represents the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structures value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位无符号的整数，它将结合 data2、 data3 和 data4 以组成一个表示新的 128 位无符号整数<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构值。

trans-unit.source: An 32-bit unsigned integer which will be combined with data1, data3, and data4 to make up the 128-bit unsigned integer that represents the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structures value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位无符号的整数，它将结合 data1、 data3 和 data4 以组成一个表示新的 128 位无符号整数<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构值。

trans-unit.source: An 32-bit unsigned integer which will be combined with data1, data2, and data4 to make up the 128-bit unsigned integer that represents the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structures value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位无符号的整数，它将结合 data1、 data2 和 data4 以组成一个表示新的 128 位无符号整数<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构值。

trans-unit.source: An 32-bit unsigned integer which will be combined with data1, data2, and data3 to make up the 128-bit unsigned integer that represents the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structures value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位无符号的整数，它将结合 data1、 data2 和 data3 以组成一个表示新的 128 位无符号整数<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构值。

trans-unit.source: The Abs method gets the absolute value of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Abs 方法获取数值的绝对值<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>参数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.

A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure whose <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*> property contains the unsigned number representing the absolute value of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> parameter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"> </xref>结构，它的<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>属性包含该无符号的数值表示数值的绝对值<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>参数。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Calculates the sum of the two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> operators.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure whose <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*> property contains the sum.
trans-unit.target: 一个新<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构，它的<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>属性包含总和。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The scale of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> operand will be adjusted to the number of digits indicated by the digits parameter.
trans-unit.target: 小数位数为<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>操作数将调整由数字参数指示的数字个数。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the fRound parameter, the value will either be rounded to the appropriate number of digits or truncated.
trans-unit.target: 根据 fRound 参数的值，值将被舍入到适当数量的数字或截断。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to be adjusted.
The number of digits in the adjusted structure.
trans-unit.target: 调整后的结构中的数字个数。

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the new Value will be rounded, if <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the value will be truncated.
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，新值将舍入，如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，则该值将被截断。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure whose <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*> property contains the adjusted number.
trans-unit.target: 一个新<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构，它的<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>属性包含调整后的数字。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Get the binary representation of the value of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure as an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 获取的二进制表示形式的值<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>的字节数组形式的结构。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes that contains the binary representation of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure's value.
trans-unit.target: 包含的二进制表示形式的字节数组<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the smallest whole number greater than or equal to the specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 返回大于或等于指定的最小整数<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure for which the ceiling value is to be calculated.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"> </xref>上限值要为其计算的结构。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> representing the smallest whole number greater than or equal to the specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"> </xref>表示最小整数大于或等于指定<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Compares this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> instance to the supplied <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> object and returns an indication of their relative values.
trans-unit.target: 比较此<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>实例与所提供<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>对象并返回对其相对值的指示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> to be compared.
A signed number that indicates the relative values of the instance and the object.
trans-unit.target: 一个带符号的数字，指示该实例和对象的相对值。

trans-unit.source: Return value
Condition
Less than zero
This instance is less than the object.
Zero
This instance is the same as the object.
Greater than zero
This instance is greater than the object -or- The object is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 此实例大于对象-该对象为空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)

trans-unit.source: Compares this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> instance to the supplied <xref:System.Object> and returns an indication of their relative values.
trans-unit.target: 比较此<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>实例与所提供<xref:System.Object>并返回对其相对值的指示。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to be compared.
A signed number that indicates the relative values of the instance and the object.
trans-unit.target: 一个带符号的数字，指示该实例和对象的相对值。

trans-unit.source: Return Value
Condition
Less than zero
This instance is less than the object.
Zero
This instance is the same as the object.
Greater than zero
This instance is greater than the object -or- The object is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 此实例大于对象-该对象为空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the value of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> operand to the indicated precision and scale.
trans-unit.target: 调整的值<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>操作数指定的精度和小数位数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure whose value is to be adjusted.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"> </xref>其值是进行调整的结构。

trans-unit.source: The precision for the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
The scale for the new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure whose Value has been adjusted to the precision and scale indicated in the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 一个新<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>参数中指定其值已调整到的精度和小数位数的结构。

trans-unit.source: Gets the binary representation of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure as an array of integers.
trans-unit.target: 获取的二进制表示形式这<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>作为整数的数组的结构。

trans-unit.source: An array of integers that contains the binary representation of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 包含的二进制表示形式这整数的数组<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: The division operator calculates the results of dividing the first <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> operand by the second.
trans-unit.target: 除法运算符计算除以第一个结果<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>操作数除以第二个操作数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A new <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure whose <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*> property contains the results of the division.
trans-unit.target: 一个新<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构，它的<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>属性包含除法运算的结果。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Compares the supplied <xref:System.Object> parameter to the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> instance.
The <xref:System.Object> to be compared.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if object is an instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> and the two are equal.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果对象的实例<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>和两个是否相等。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Performs a logical comparison of the two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> operands to determine whether they are equal.
trans-unit.target: 执行逻辑比较两个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>操作数以确定它们是否相等。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two values are equal.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果两个值相等。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
If either instance is null, the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SqlDecimal" name="SqlDecimal" href=""></xref> will be null.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一实例为 null 的值<xref uid="langword_csharp_SqlDecimal" name="SqlDecimal" href=""></xref>将为 null。

trans-unit.source: Rounds a specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> number to the next lower whole number.
trans-unit.target: 指定将舍入<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>数字到下一个较小的整数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure for which the floor value is to be calculated.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure that contains the whole number part of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"> </xref>结构，其中包含此的整数部分<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位有符号的整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that indicates the XSD of the specified <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，该值指示指定的 XSD <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Performs a logical comparison of two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structures to determine whether the first is greater than the second.
trans-unit.target: 执行逻辑比较两个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构，以确定第一个是否大于第二个。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is less than the second instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>即<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>如果第一个实例小于第二个实例。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Performs a logical comparison of the two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> parameters to determine whether the first is greater than or equal to the second.
trans-unit.target: 执行逻辑比较两个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>参数，以确定第一个是否大于或等于第二个。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is greater than or equal to the second instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"> </xref>即<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>的第一个实例是否大于或等于第二个实例。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.

If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> will be <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean.Null"></xref>.
Indicates whether this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure is null.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否这<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构为 null。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling Null Values](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理 Null 值](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

Indicates whether the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*> of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure is greater than zero.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*> is assigned to null.
Otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Performs a logical comparison of two <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structures to determine whether the first is less than the second.
trans-unit.target: 执行逻辑比较两个<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构，以确定第一个是否小于第二个。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref> if the first instance is less than the second instance.

Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*> is non-zero; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if zero; otherwise Null.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>为非零;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果零; 否则为 Null。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte"></xref>.

A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte"></xref> structure whose <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> equals the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> of this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte"> </xref>结构，它的<xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref>等于<xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref>此<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure's Value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte"></xref> structure's <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> will be 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构的值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>、 <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte"> </xref>结构的<xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref>将是 1。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte"></xref> structure's <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> will be 0.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte"></xref>结构的<xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref>将为 0。

trans-unit.source: Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble"></xref> structure with the same value as this instance of <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble"> </xref>结构具有相同的值与此实例的<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"> </xref>。

A <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString"></xref> structure whose value is a string representing the value contained in this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.

trans-unit.source: Converts this <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to <xref:System.String>.

A new <xref:System.String> object that contains the string representation of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure's <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: 一个新<xref:System.String>对象，其中包含的字符串表示形式<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构的<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*>属性。</xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal.Value*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Truncates the specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure's value to the that you want position.
trans-unit.target: 将截断指定<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref>结构的值与你希望的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure to be truncated.
The decimal position to which the number will be truncated.
trans-unit.target: 数字将被截断到小数位。

trans-unit.source: Supply a negative value for the position parameter in order to truncate the value to the corresponding position to the left of the decimal point.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个负值 position 为了截断到小数点左边的相应位置的值的参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal"></xref> structure.
This property is read-only.
